text: Wͻ’mmmfa anidie (anaa obuo, anaa tumi) a εfata paa mma Nyankopͻn wͻ nokorε mu sεdeε Netumi siteε, εberε a wͻ’ka sε: ‘’Nyankopͻn nsianee hwee mmaa ͻdasani“. Ka sε: “Hwan na osianee Nwoma no a Mose de baeε a, na εyε nhyerεnee ne kwankyerε dema adasamma a mo (Yudafoͻ) motwerεε no nkrataa a yakyekyε mu soͻ, daa (emu nsεm no bi) adie de dodoͻ no ara sieε; na mokyerεε adeε a mo, anaa moagyanom mpo nnim?” Ka sε: “Nyankopͻn. Enti wodeε gyae wͻn ma wͻ’nkeka wͻ’nsεm hunu no na wͻ’ni agorͻ
